languages.text: "Я ценю твои усилия, но не надо меня "ограждать" от всех проблем. Это мой корабль и мои люди".
"I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."
languages.original_text: "Я ценю твои усилия, но не надо меня "ограждать" от всех проблем. Это мой корабль и мои люди".

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."
"I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."
"I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."
"I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

languages.text: “我很感谢你的努力，但你没必要让我‘彻底不用操心’所有问题。这是我的船，这些船员都是我的下属。”
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

traits.locale_text: “我很感谢你的努力，但你没必要让我‘彻底不用操心’所有问题。这是我的船，这些船员都是我的下属。”

languages.text: «Agradezco sus esfuerzos, pero no necesita "protegerme" de todos los problemas. Es mi nave y es mi gente».
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco sus esfuerzos, pero no necesita "protegerme" de todos los problemas. Es mi nave y es mi gente».

languages.text: 「お前の努力には感謝するが、すべての問題から私を『隔離』する必要はない。これは私の船であり、彼らは私の仲間なのだ」
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の努力には感謝するが、すべての問題から私を『隔離』する必要はない。これは私の船であり、彼らは私の仲間なのだ」

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch für Eure Mühen, doch Ihr müsst nicht von allen Problemen 'fernhalten'. Das ist mein Schiff, das sind meine Leute."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch für Eure Mühen, doch Ihr müsst nicht von allen Problemen 'fernhalten'. Das ist mein Schiff, das sind meine Leute."

languages.text: « J'apprécie vos efforts, mais je ne vous ai pas demandé de m'épargner les problèmes qui surviennent à mon bord. C'est de mon vaisseau et de mon équipage que nous parlons. »
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

traits.locale_text: « J'apprécie vos efforts, mais je ne vous ai pas demandé de m'épargner les problèmes qui surviennent à mon bord. C'est de mon vaisseau et de mon équipage que nous parlons. »

languages.text: "Çabalarını takdir ediyorum ama beni tüm sorunlardan 'muhafaza etmene' gerek yok. Bu gemi benim, tayfası da öyle."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your efforts, but there is no need to 'insulate' me from all problems. This is my ship, and these are my people."

traits.locale_text: "Çabalarını takdir ediyorum ama beni tüm sorunlardan 'muhafaza etmene' gerek yok. Bu gemi benim, tayfası da öyle."
